abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights leaf identification apps for autumn walks and apps for finding hiking trails; pumpkin recipes app noted.
lead_paragraph: Android and iOS apps suggested for fall activities include Leafsnap, Virginia Tech Tree ID, AllTrails, BrightNest and Pumpkin Recipes.

headline.main: Help in Identifying Trees for a More Colorful Autumn
headline.print_headline: Peeping Leaves and Taking In the Autumn Scenery

snippet: Android and iOS apps suggested for fall activities include Leafsnap, Virginia Tech Tree ID, AllTrails, BrightNest and Pumpkin Recipes.
